Updated com.idega.block.survey to 3.1.3
Updated com.idega.block.survey to 3.1.2 Updated com.idega.block.category to 3.1.4
Added com.idega.block.survey (3.1.1) bundle
Updated cases bundle to 1.0.34
Updated rafverk bundle to 1.0.3
Updated rafverk bundle to 1.0.2
Updated citizen bundle to 1.0.23. Updated rafverk bundle to 1.0.1
fmr bundle: changed path to keystore
Commented out focal bundle since version is used for production.
Fixed bug when importing older ElectricalInstallations from Access (missing pointer to RealEstate).
Update to deliver import of older ElectricalInstallations from Access.
Updated dependency of is.idega.idegaweb.egov.cases to 1.0.31
Added dependencies for course system.
Updated dependency of is.idega.idegaweb.egov.cases to 1.0.30
Update dependency to is.idega.idegaweb.egov.cases.focal to 1.0.3
Updated com.idega.core to 3.1.62 (eplatform update 3.1.105) to fix the users preferred locale bug.
Update dependency to com.idega.block.process to 3.1.14
Added [is.idega.block.modernus 3.1.2] counter.

[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.casess 1.0.28] Added displaying of sender's email and phone when viewing cases as administrator. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.citizen 1.0.16] Changed so that all personal ID inputs allow a maximum of 10 letters/numbers.
Refactoring/Elimination of se bundles.

[is.idega.block.pki 1.0.1] Added PKI module [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.citizen 1.0.13] Upgraded because dependency from new PKI block [se.idega.idegaweb.commune 1.0.8] Upgraded because dependency from new PKI block [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.cases 1.0.26] Updated because of localized string change from hlynur.

[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.cases 1.0.25] Added possibility to add attachments to new cases. [is.idega.idegaweb.egov.cases 1.0.25] Fixed so that the cases fetcher allows for choosing only parent category and leaving sub category blank.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.cases 1.0.23] Added a new block to fetch all cases by a user specified criteria. An Excel sheet can then be fetched based on the results.

[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.cases 1.0.22] Changed CaseCreator so it does not use Form.maintainParameter for the message text. The text would be sent incomplete if it contained html characters because of the confirmation step and a hidden input. The html would get invalid.
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.nest 3.1.3] Added missing dependency
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.cases 1.0.21] Fixed a NPE in CaseViewer when user reactivated the case
[is.idega.idegaweb.egov.cases 1.0.20] Fixed a NPE in CaseCreator Also set a fixed version for se.idega.idegaweb.commune 1.0.7
Updated all blocks to correct versions.
Built new version on ePlatform 3.1 release for demo purposes.
